com.podevs.android.utilities

Class TwoViewsArrayAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<T>
        • com.podevs.android.utilities.TwoViewsArrayAdapter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the objects you will pass in the constructor
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class TwoViewsArrayAdapter<T>
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<T>
    Provides an array adapter, except it supports two text elements. You must supply a Getter on which will be performed get(x, 0) and get(x, 1) to get the elements of the object list

        Construcotr
        Parameters:
        context -
        resource - The layout of the view
        text1 - The id of the first text element
        text2 - The id of the second text element
        objects - The list of items
        getter - Allows to get(object, 0) and get(object, 1) to get the two texts
